Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 13
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.Poster Nr. 13 shows Hu Feng in the top panel holding playing cards emblazoned with the characters "Revolutionary writer" (革命作家); the bottom panel shows the reverse of the cards Hu is holding: an image of Chiang Kai-shek (Jiang Jieshi); a dagger piercing a heart; hand grenades; a contract drenched in blood.
